data.title: Game Audio Network Guild
data.meta_description: 1st Annual GANG Awards – 2002 Released Games The Game Audio Network Guild held the 1st Annual G.A.N.G. Awards Show in San Jose, California during the Game Developers Conference. Congratulations to the following winners: Overall Award Nominees Winner Audio of the Year Hitman 2: Silent Assassin Mafia Medal Of Honor: Frontline No One Lives Forever […]
data.text:
We offer six levels of sponsorship that meet the needs of our industry supporters. We can customize points within a sponsorship level to address specific corporate goals and requirements. Game Audio Network Guild is a California non-profit corporation.

We want to hear from you! Connect with us using any of the platforms below.
